forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 9C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 48F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. WSW winds shifting to N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 38F. WSW winds shifting to N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 48F. Winds N at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 33F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 40F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
